snippet.title: Far Cry 4 - Valley of the Yetis Trailer
snippet.description:
Valley of the Yetis, the new add-on content for Far Cry 4, will be released on March 10, 2015.

Follow Far Cry 4 at GameSpot.com!
http://www.gamespot.com/far-cry-4/
Official Site - http://far-cry.ubi.com/

Check out our review!
Watch - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JBtXR9PE3q0
Read - http://www.gamespot.com/reviews/far-cry-4-review/

Visit all of our channels:
Features & Reviews - http://www.youtube.com/user/gamespot
Gameplay & Guides - http://www.youtube.com/user/gamespotgameplay
Trailers - http://www.youtube.com/user/gamespottrailers
Mobile Gaming - http://www.youtube.com/user/gamespotmobile

Like  - http://www.facebook.com/GameSpot
Follow - http://www.twitter.com/GameSpot
Stream Live - http://twitch.tv/GameSpot

http://www.gamespot.com
